item.title: A Complete Unknown Box Office Lands On Major All-Time Domestic Chart In Just One Week
item.description: A Complete Unknown, James Mangold's Bob Dylan biopic starring Timothée Chalamet, lands on an all-time domestic box office chart after just one week.

item.title: Was Loki Ever An MCU Villain? Tom Hiddleston Didn’t Think So
item.description: Tom Hiddleston once explained why Loki was never an actual villain in the MCU, and the God of Mischief's MCU appearances support his assertion.

item.title: Nosferatu Box Office Enters Major All-Time Global Milestone For Focus Features
item.description: Nosferatu has quickly accomplished a major global box office milestone as the long-awaited horror movie remake continues to perform well.
